response.overview: Two fashion giants of yesteryear play out their rivalry and take a grudge to the bitter end. In a disastrous attempt to reignite her celebrity and reinvent herself as a West End star, Anne Thrope- Sadie Frost, along with the help of her camp assistant Verdell- Neeraj Singh, stars in a new musical adaptation of Orwell classic Animal Farm, entitled Animal Charm. During a musical number Anne is abducted by masked vixen animal rights activists led by old time rival Audrey Hoober- Sally Phillips. Over the course of a single night, while Verdell tries to convince butch, no-nonsense policeman- Boy George to take the disappearance seriously, this conflict reaches its horrible conclusion, and all concerned realise just how much fashion has changed.
response.title: Animal Charm
